Name: Make Bed
Description: Arrange pillows and straighten sheets

Name: Empty Dishwasher
Description: Put away clean dishes

Name: Feed the Dog
Description: Give food and fresh water to the dog

Name: Water Plants
Description: Water indoor plants in the living room

Name: Take Out Trash
Description: Collect trash bags and take them outside

Name: Vacuum Living Room
Description: Vacuum the carpet and floor

Name: Clean Bathroom Sink
Description: Wipe down the sink and faucet

Name: Sort Laundry
Description: Separate whites and colors

Name: Dust Shelves
Description: Remove dust from bookshelves

Name: Clean Windows
Description: Wipe windows inside the room

Name: Mow the Lawn
Description: Cut the grass in the garden

Name: Clean Hamster Cage
Description: Change bedding and clean the cage

Name: Organize Toys
Description: Put all toys back in their boxes

Name: Set the Table
Description: Prepare plates and cutlery for dinner

Name: Fold Clothes
Description: Fold clean laundry neatly

Name: Sweep Porch
Description: Sweep leaves and dirt from the entrance

Name: Wash Car
Description: Help wash the family car

Name: Clean Mirror
Description: Wipe the mirror until streak-free

Name: Organize Books
Description: Sort books by size or color

Name: Deep Clean Room
Description: Thorough cleaning under furniture
